short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display the competitive rank of users in the Twitch chat.
short.fr: Affiche le rang comp√©titif des joueurs dans le chat Twitch.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to display a badge in the Twitch chat, linked to the rank of the users, and depending on the category you are watching. 

CrossTracker is an application for players looking to share their competitive rank across multiple platforms. Get a Discord role or a Twitch badge to stand out and interact with other players of the same level, creating a strong and engaged community.  

By synchronizing your platforms, you can be sure that your current rank is authentic. Learn more at https://crosstracker.net/
long.fr:
This extension allows you to display a badge in the Twitch chat, linked to the rank of the users, and depending on the category you are watching. 

CrossTracker is an application for players looking to share their competitive rank across multiple platforms. Get a Discord role or a Twitch badge to stand out and interact with other players of the same level, creating a strong and engaged community.  

By synchronizing your platforms, you can be sure that your current rank is authentic.
Learn more at https://crosstracker.net/
